subject: Sports Injuries
Deaths (Fatalities)
Interscholastic Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: At Arlington High School in Riverside, players and coaches felt the loss of a popular player, who died just days after collapsing from a head injury, as they persevered through an up-and-down season.
snippet: At Arlington High School in Riverside, players and coaches felt the loss of a popular player, who died just days after collapsing from a head injury, as they persevered through an up-and-down season.
